|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ8074A; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 2.2 GHz<!-- 2.2 GHz (+ NPU @1.7GHz) --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Toshiba;THGBMHG6C1LBAIL; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;; |flash2size = 512 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT40A512M16LY-075:E; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5054; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad1ay = <!-- Maximum throughput rated at --> |rad1ax = 574 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5054; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 1201 |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
|rad3chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5054; |rad3oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad3_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad3txchains = 4 |rad3rxchains = 4 |rad3sstreams = 4 |rad3stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad3ax = 2402 |rad3ac = 1733 |nqam3 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad3n = 600 |rad3a = 54 |rad3freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== There is unpopulated circuitry on the board for an additional 2.5GbE ethernet jack.
"D9WFH" Micron [https://www.micron.com/support/tools-and-utilities/fbga?fbga=D9WFH FBGA code] on the RAM corresponds to part number MT40A512M16LY-075:E
{{FCC ST|10/02/2019}}
==See also== :[[List of 802.11ax Hardware]] • [[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices]] *[[Verizon LVR1 (5G Home Router)]] *[[Verizon LRV5-100]] *[[Verizon LVM1]] *[[Verizon LVX1]]
